cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to 100 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing thread configuration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SSB per RACH occasion and CB preambles per SSB to 100 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將每個 RACH 場合和每個 SSB 的 CB 前導數設定為 100 超過允許的最大值，導致配置驗證失敗。
